entry.title: vikiboss/60s-static-host: ⏰ A lightweight repository hosting daily 60s news data, automatically updated via GitHub Actions.
entry.content: ⏰ A lightweight repository hosting daily 60s news data, automatically updated via GitHub Actions.

entry.title: Rahul9969/Wikipedia-Clone: Wikipedia Clone is a simple web app that fetches Wikipedia search results based on user input. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it uses the Wikipedia API to display relevant article links dynamically. A great project for learning API integration and real-time search functionality. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use!
entry.content: Wikipedia Clone is a simple web app that fetches Wikipedia search results based on user input. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it uses the Wikipedia API to display relevant article links dynamically. A great project for learning API integration and real-time search functionality. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use!

entry.title: fengxinming/date-manip: A lightweight JavaScript date utility library that provides modularity, high performance, and additional features. It supports various date operations, including date addition and subtraction, formatting, comparison, etc.
entry.content: A lightweight JavaScript date utility library that provides modularity, high performance, and additional features. It supports various date operations, including date addition and subtraction, formatting, comparison, etc.

entry.title: Ip-Tec/ContactSync: ContactSync is a lightweight mobile app designed to help small businesses easily manage and synchronize their contacts. By providing a straightforward interface and efficient contact management, ContactSync aims to simplify your workflow.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: Utkarsh030505/Keeper: A simple and intuitive note-keeping app to organize your thoughts, ideas, and to-dos effortlessly. ✨ Features ✅ Create, edit, and delete notes ✅ User-friendly and minimalistic UI ✅ Responsive and fast performance ✅ Secure and lightweight 📌 Stay organized and never forget important notes!
entry.content: A simple and intuitive note-keeping app to organize your thoughts, ideas, and to-dos effortlessly. ✨ Features ✅ Create, edit, and delete notes ✅ User-friendly and minimalistic UI ✅ Responsive and fast performance ✅ Secure and lightweight 📌 Stay organized and never forget important notes!

entry.title: krishnas1998/react-selectly: A flexible and customizable multi-select dropdown component for React. Supports tag-like selection, keyboard navigation, and custom options. Designed to be lightweight and easy to use.

entry.title: N454R-4L1/Prayer-Timings: This is a lightweight, responsive web app that displays the next Salah (prayer) time along with upcoming prayer timings for the day. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript the app features a clean, minimalistic design optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
entry.content: This is a lightweight, responsive web app that displays the next Salah (prayer) time along with upcoming prayer timings for the day. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript the app features a clean, minimalistic design optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
